common.title: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory - Small Batch Apparel Customization
common.description: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory specializes in small batch apparel OEM services with a minimum order of 100 pieces, serving customers in Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia and other regions. We provide professional pattern making and OEM services with reliable quality and on-time delivery.
common.keywords: Apparel OEM, Small Batch Customization, Taiwan Apparel OEM, Thailand Apparel OEM, Malaysia Apparel OEM, NOVA Apparel Factory
common.ogTitle: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory - Small Batch Apparel Customization
common.ogDescription: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory specializes in small batch apparel OEM services with a minimum order of 100 pieces, serving customers in Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia and other regions. We provide professional pattern making and OEM services with reliable quality and on-time delivery.

hero.title: NOVA Apparel OEM - Minimum 100 Pieces
hero.subtitle: We focus on apparel customization services for customers in Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia and other regions, providing professional pattern making and OEM services with reliable quality and on-time delivery.

advantage1.title: Small Minimum Order Quantity
advantage1.desc: We support a minimum order of 100 pieces to meet small batch customization needs

advantage2.title: Professional Pattern Making
advantage2.desc: With over 5 years of pattern making experience, we accurately realize customer requirements

advantage3.title: On-Time Delivery
advantage3.desc: We partner with established factories to ensure on-time delivery of all orders

trust.title: Trust Endorsement
trust.sampleDesc: Showcasing our pattern making quality with meticulous attention to detail and precise patterns

review1.name: Ahmad - Indonesia Customer
review1.text: The casual wear customization perfectly meets our needs. The fabric is comfortable, the fit is excellent, and our customers love it. We have already placed a repeat order.

review2.name: Mr. Chen - Taiwan Customer
review2.text: The pattern making for our 480 professional suits was extremely accurate, delivery was on time, and the fit is perfect. We will continue to cooperate with NOVA.

review3.name: Sara - Thailand Customer
review3.text: The retro clothing patterns exceeded our expectations with excellent color reproduction, making them perfect for our market. We have already reordered.

review4.name: Mohamed - Malaysia Customer
review4.text: The Muslim clothing design perfectly meets our requirements with excellent attention to detail. Our cooperation was smooth and delivery was on time.

review5.name: Mr. Li - Hong Kong Customer
review5.text: The 420 business suits we ordered fit perfectly, our employees are very satisfied, delivery was on time, and our cooperation was pleasant.

review6.name: Nguyen - Vietnam Customer
review6.text: The traditional clothing customization perfectly meets our cultural needs with excellent attention to detail and great quality. We will cooperate again.

review7.name: William - Singapore Customer
review7.text: The uniform customization quality is excellent with breathable fabric, our employees are satisfied, and we have already recommended NOVA to our partners.

review8.name: Maria - Philippines Customer
review8.text: The summer dress patterns are excellent with stylish designs and lightweight fabric, making them perfect for the tropical climate.

review9.name: Kim - Korea Customer
review9.text: The Korean-style casual wear patterns are very fashionable with high-quality fabric and excellent attention to detail, perfectly meeting our market demands.

review10.name: Tanaka - Japan Customer
review10.text: The business formal wear pattern making is extremely precise with perfect tailoring and excellent fabric drape, fully meeting our quality requirements.

review11.name: Raj - India Customer
review11.text: The traditional attire customization is highly professional with vibrant colors, comfortable fabric, and exquisite craftsmanship details, very popular with our customers.

review12.name: Carlos - Brazil Customer
review12.text: The sportswear and casual wear designs are very fashionable with breathable moisture-wicking fabric, comfortable to wear, and our consumers have given excellent feedback.

review13.name: Liu - Macau Customer
review13.text: The high-end women's clothing customization is of superior quality with elegant patterns, premium fabric texture, and meticulous craftsmanship, making NOVA our ideal partner.

case1.title: Indonesia Casual Wear Customization
case1.desc: 320 pieces of casual wear customization with comfortable and breathable fabric, suitable for the local climate and daily wear
case1.feedback: Lead time: 12 days | Customer feedback: The casual wear is highly comfortable and suitable for the local climate, so we have placed a repeat order

case2.title: Taiwan Professional Attire Customization
case2.desc: 850 pieces of high-quality professional attire customization with precise patterns and on-time delivery
case2.feedback: Lead time: 14 days | Customer feedback: The patterns fit our needs well, and all employees are satisfied

case3.title: Thailand Retro Dress Customization
case3.desc: 620 pieces of retro dress customization with high color reproduction, perfectly suited for the local market
case3.feedback: Lead time: 10 days | Customer feedback: The retro style is very popular with our customers, we have reordered

case4.title: Malaysia Muslim Clothing Customization
case4.desc: 410 pieces of Muslim clothing customization with meticulous attention to detail, meeting local requirements
case4.feedback: Lead time: 15 days | Customer feedback: The details are handled very well, meeting our religious requirements

case5.title: Singapore Business Attire Customization
case5.desc: 920 pieces of high-quality business attire customization with precise patterns, suitable for business occasions and delivered on time
case5.feedback: Lead time: 11 days | Customer feedback: The business patterns are very professional, meeting our business needs

case6.title: Vietnam Traditional Ao Dai Customization
case6.desc: 580 pieces of traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai customization that faithfully reproduces traditional styles with meticulous attention to detail, respecting local culture
case6.feedback: Lead time: 12 days | Customer feedback: The traditional style reproduction is excellent and very popular with local customers

about.title: About Us
about.teamDesc: NOVA Apparel Factory has over 5 years of specialized experience in apparel pattern making, focusing on batch apparel OEM production. We are familiar with apparel style requirements in different regions and can accurately realize our customers' design specifications.
about.coopDesc: We have established deep partnerships with reputable apparel factories, ensuring that orders with a minimum of 100 pieces are delivered on time with quality that meets customer requirements. You don't need to worry about production or delivery issues.

step1.title: Requirements Communication
step1.desc: Communicate customization requirements with customers to determine style, quantity, and specifications

step2.title: Pattern Making Confirmation
step2.desc: Create pattern samples and confirm pattern specifications and quality with customers

step3.title: Production Follow-up
step3.desc: Monitor production progress to ensure orders are manufactured on schedule

step4.title: Logistics Delivery
step4.desc: Arrange logistics delivery to customers after production is completed
